Text: Single Princesses and Blind Dates:  Filming began on April 1, 2010 in Shanghai, China and ended in June 2010.

Text: Single Princesses and Blind Dates:  The series began broadcasting on Chinese channel Hunan TV from September 17, 2010 on Sunday and Saturday's at 10:30 to 11:30 with 2 episodes airing per day, ending on October 2, 2010 with 30 episodes total.
